content: Career Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 19 Nov 2018I work in as an accounting firm, but my passion is in writing. Is there any way to get started? Is it possible to write full-time in Singapore?I've been an accountant for 3 years. I pays relatively well, and I am good at what I do, but it feels like a dead job. I only learnt it because it was a safe option for me. I am passionate about writing, but have not really started on any big projects. What should I do?3 answersAnswerBump0
